net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute

Interface AttributeReadFormatter<VALUE>

  • Type Parameters:
    VALUE - is the generic type of the value to pass to the formatter.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AttributeWriteFormatter<VALUE>, UiWidgetCheckboxesField<VALUE>, UiWidgetComboboxField<VALUE>, UiWidgetOptionsBase<VALUE>, UiWidgetOptionsField<VALUE>, UiWidgetRadioButtonsField<VALUE>, UiWidgetRadioButtonsVerticalField<VALUE>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetComboboxField, AbstractUiWidgetListBoxField, AbstractUiWidgetOptionsField, AbstractUiWidgetRadioButtonsField, AbstractUiWidgetRadioButtonsVerticalField, UiWidgetComboboxFieldGwt, UiWidgetComboboxFieldTestImpl, UiWidgetRadioButtonsFieldGwt, UiWidgetRadioButtonsTestImpl, UiWidgetRadioButtonsVerticalFieldGwt, UiWidgetRadioButtonsVerticalFieldTestImpl

    public interface AttributeReadFormatter<VALUE>
    This interface gives read access to the formatter attribute of an object.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Formatter<VALUE> getFormatter()
      This method gets the Formatter of this object.

    • Method Detail

      • getFormatter

        Formatter<VALUE> getFormatter()
        This method gets the Formatter of this object. It is used to format a value of this object so it can be displayed to the end-user.
        Returns:
        the Formatter.
